titleStmt.title: The speech of the late Lord Russel, to the sheriffs together with the paper deliver'd by him to them, at the place of execution, on July 21. 1683.
titleStmt.author: Russell, William, Lord, 1639-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Darby, by direction of the Lady Russel,

notesStmt.note: This edition has the words "Entred according to order" in black letter above the colophon.
Identified as Wing R2355 on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 1800.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
